name: Brewing Potions
description: A character who has proficiency with the Herbalism Kit can create potions of healing and other potions. Brewing a potion requires the character to have proficiency with a Herbalism Kit, access to suitable ingredients worth half the potion's market price, and a sufficient amount of downtime.
requirements: Ingredients worth half the potion's market price
Access to a workspace with heat source and containers

commonPotions.name: Potion of Climbing
commonPotions.effect: Climb Speed equal to walking speed for 1 hour

commonPotions.name: Potion of Fire Breath
commonPotions.effect: Exhale fire in a 30-foot cone (4d6 Fire)

commonPotions.name: Potion of Resistance
commonPotions.effect: Resistance to one damage type for 1 hour

commonPotions.name: Potion of Flying
commonPotions.effect: Fly Speed of 60 feet for 1 hour

notes: If the brewing is interrupted, the attempt fails and the ingredients are wasted. A day of brewing requires 8 hours of work. The DM may allow an Intelligence (Herbalism Kit) check for complex potions.
